EmailTemplate.name: Tour Outcome guide
EmailTemplate.subject: Exciting changes coming to Salesforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
We are so excited for the launch of our new features and enhancement, Account Selector and Tour Outcome form.
What's changing?
Updated Tour Outcome
New fields, for better reporting Better sync with Spacestation New UI
Click here for training guide Click here for Video
Account Selector New Feature The objective of the Account Selector page is to prevent the creation of duplicate Accounts by identifying and merging into existing records. The Account Selector page appears when converting a Lead into an Account/Contact/Opportunity. The page contains a list of existing accounts that are possible matches for the new record to be merged into.
Click here for training guide Click here for Video
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Sincerely, Susie Romero
